== Reports on Ubuntu Forum Council Meetings ==

=== February 2008 ===

* Implementing a positive feedback "Reputation" system. (approved)
* Damage control mechanisms. Ways that staff/admin can trigger more moderation power. (discussed)
* Policy on malicious code in post and protecting users from it, and discussion of ForumContentCertification spec. (discussed)
* Implementing the Ubuntu membership approval by the Forums Council (discussed)
* Ubuntu teams members as mods in their area. (not approved)
